```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(tidyquant)

```

```{r}
index_info <- tibble(
  Country = c("United States", "Germany", "China", "United Kingdom", "Canada", "Japan"),
  Ticker = c("^GSPC", "^GDAXI", "000001.SS", "^FTSE", "^GSPTSE", "^N225")
)

```

```{r}
indexes <- index_info %>%
  mutate(Data = map(Ticker, ~ tq_get(.x, from = "2020-01-01", get = "stock.prices"))) %>%
  unnest(Data)

```

```{r}
indexes <- indexes %>%
  filter(date >= as.Date("2025-01-20")) %>%
  group_by(Country) %>%
  mutate(Baseline = close[date == as.Date("2025-01-20")][1]) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(Pct_Change = 100 * (close - Baseline) / Baseline)

```

```{r}
ggplot(indexes, aes(x = date, y = Pct_Change, color = Country)) +
  geom_line(size = 1.1) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent_format(scale = 1)) +
  labs(
    title = "Major Global Stock Indexes Since Jan 17, 2020",
    y = "Percent Change",
    x = NULL,
    caption = "Source: Yahoo Finance via tidyquant"
  ) +
  theme(legend.position = "right")

```
